enjug.erijan.games.yatzy.rules

Class ScoreBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • enjug.erijan.games.yatzy.rules.ScoreBox

  • public class ScoreBox
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds score calculated from a rule. ScoreBox class has a scoreRule which is called when score is set. There is also a temp score for intermediate result analysis. The score Rule is set on construction of the box object. The object is aware if its score is set. Created by Jan Eriksson on 27/10/15.
